about_the_game:
Thugsters Battle Royale is a completely different battle royale game than most of the popular ones. In this game, you need to fight against other thugs all around the world to show them who's the boss of the night city. There are a lot of nice features in this game that will make you enjoy the game a lot and get addicted to it. So what are you waiting for? Grab your Thugsters Battle Royale game copy and show them who's the boss of the city, make it your city!


Features and content :

- Compete against people from all around the world.

- Stay alive and last man standing to take over the city.

- Let your F-16 pilot to drop you to the city and jump with parachute to get to the city.

- Get the feeling of enjoying a battle royale game in the night city.

- Find weapons to kill your opponents.

- Enjoy the beatiness of the night city.

- Some nice sound effects for weapons.

- Awesome character model.

- Big city.

content_descriptors.notes: Thugsters Battle Royale is a battle royale game that contains guns, you kill people and that's all that makes it a violent game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Inter Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia MX150
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
